Available OpenAI Formulas

=CHATGPT(prompt, [model], [maxTokens], [temperature])

Main function for ChatGPT API calls.

=CHATGPT("What is the capital of " & A1)
=CHATGPT(A1, "gpt-4o") // specify model
=CHATGPT(A1, "gpt-4o", 300) // with custom token length
=CHATGPT(A1, "gpt-4o", 300, 0.7) // all parameters
Defaults:
  • model: "gpt-4o-mini"
  • maxTokens: 150
  • temperature: 0.0

=CHATGPT3(prompt, [maxTokens], [temperature])

Uses GPT-3.5-turbo model (most cost-effective).

=CHATGPT3(A1)
=CHATGPT3(A1, 300) // with custom token length
=CHATGPT3(A1, 300, 0.7) // all parameters
Defaults:
  • maxTokens: 150
  • temperature: 0.0

=CHATGPT4(prompt, [maxTokens], [temperature])

Uses GPT-4 model (most powerful).

=CHATGPT4(A1)
=CHATGPT4(A1, 300) // with custom token length
=CHATGPT4(A1, 300, 0.7) // all parameters
Defaults:
  • maxTokens: 150
  • temperature: 0.0

=CHATGPTWEBSEARCH(prompt, [plainText], [maxTokens], [temperature])

Uses GPT-4o with web search capability. Returns up-to-date answers from the web.

=CHATGPTWEBSEARCH(A1)
=CHATGPTWEBSEARCH(A1, TRUE) // plain text only
=CHATGPTWEBSEARCH(A1, FALSE, 300) // with custom token length
=CHATGPTWEBSEARCH(A1, FALSE, 300, 0.7) // all parameters
Defaults:
  • plainText: FALSE
  • maxTokens: 150
  • temperature: 0.0

=OPENAIKEY(apiKey)

Sets your OpenAI API key.

=OPENAIKEY("your-api-key-here")

=CHATGPTSYSTEMPROMPT(prompt)

Sets the system prompt for all future calls.

=CHATGPTSYSTEMPROMPT("You are a financial advisor.")

=OPENAIMODELS()

Lists all available OpenAI models.

=OPENAIMODELS()
